mapper.select: select bi.restaurant_id,bi.keywords,bi.restaurant_name,round(avg(r.score_total),2) as score_total,count(r.restaurant_id) as review_total, bi.station1,bi.station2,bi.station3,bi.city,bi.genre1,bi.genre2,bi.genre3,bi.budget_night,bi.budget_daytime, bi.regular_holiday,fi.go_to_eat FROM restaurant_basic_info as bi left join restaurant_review as r on bi.restaurant_id= r.restaurant_id left join restaurant_features_info as fi on bi.restaurant_id= fi.restaurant_id where bi.restaurant_id=#{restaurantId} group by bi.restaurant_id,bi.keywords,bi.restaurant_name,r.restaurant_id,bi.station1,bi.station2,bi.station3,bi.city,bi.genre1,bi.genre2,bi.genre3, bi.budget_night,bi.budget_daytime,bi.regular_holiday,fi.go_to_eat;
select photo_id,photo_url from restaurant_photo where restaurant_id=#{restaurantId} and photo_code=#{photoCode} order by photo_id asc

SELECT restaurant_id,seats_num,seats_remark,private_room,private_remark,reservable, reservable_remark,smoking_cessation,smoking_remark,parking,parking_remark,space_equipment,cell_phone, course,drink,gourmet FROM restaurant_seats_menu where restaurant_id= #{restaurantId}

SELECT r.restaurant_id,r.review_id,r.review_user_id,r.review_user_name,r.review_user_age,r.review_user_gender,r.review_user_city, r.review_title,r.review_detail,r.review_img,r.score_total,r.score_taste,r.score_service,r.score_atmosphere,r.score_cost,r.score_drink, r.budget,r.visit_date,r.night_or_daytime,count(rs.sannkou_user_id) as sannkou_num FROM restaurant_review as r left join restaurant_review_sannkou as rs on r.restaurant_id=rs.restaurant_id and r.review_id=rs.review_id where r.restaurant_id= #{restaurantId} group by r.review_id,r.review_user_id,r.review_user_name,r.review_user_age,r.review_user_gender,r.review_user_city, r.review_title,r.review_detail,r.review_img,r.score_total,r.score_taste,r.score_service,r.score_atmosphere,r.score_cost,r.score_drink, r.budget,r.visit_date,r.night_or_daytime;

select rr.restaurant_id,rr.reserve_date,rr.reserve_time,rr.reserve_num,rr.room_no,rr.course_id, sm.seats_num,sm.private_room_num,sm.common_table_num,sm.lunch_start,sm.lunch_end, sm.dinner_start,sm.dinner_end from restaurant_reserve as rr left join restaurant_seats_menu as sm on rr.restaurant_id=sm.restaurant_id where rr.restaurant_id=#{restaurantId};

SELECT mp.restaurant_id,mp.photo_id,mp.photo_url,mp.photo_post_date,mp.post_user_name, count(mps.sannkou_user_id) as help_num FROM restaurant_menu_photo as mp left join restaurant_menu_photo_sannkou as mps on mp.restaurant_id=mps.restaurant_id and mp.photo_id=mps.photo_id where mp.restaurant_id=#{restaurantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by mp.restaurant_id,mp.photo_id,mp.photo_url,mp.photo_post_date,mp.post_user_name order by help_num desc
limit #{start},#{limit} ;
select count(photo_id) as menu_photo_count from restaurant_menu_photo where restaurant_id=#{restaurantId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
